name: Caldwell - Blind Mans Bluff - Connecticut - Magnum
additionalNotes: Blind Man’s Bluff Connecticut is a follow-up to the original Blind Man’s Bluff release. Like the original, this blend’s fillers are comprised of long fillers from the Dominican and Honduras, but it’s encased in a golden Ecuadorian Habano wrapper. Complex with some spice, this gem’s got flavor for days with notes of leather, cream, and toasted almonds.
